mapper.delete: DELETE FROM nurse /* QueryID : com.demo.proworks.nurse.deleteNurse */ WHERE nurse_id = #{nurseId}
mapper.select: SELECT /* QueryID : com.demo.proworks.nurse.selectNurse */ n.nurse_id AS nurseId, e.empno AS empno, e.ename AS nurseName, n.position, n.special_note AS specialNote, DATE_FORMAT(n.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS createdAt, DATE_FORMAT(n.updated_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS updatedAt, DATE_FORMAT(n.hire_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS hireDate, n.ward_id AS wardId, n.carrer, w.ward_name AS wardName FROM nurse n LEFT JOIN emp e ON n.nurse_id = e.empno LEFT JOIN ward w ON n.ward_id = w.ward_id WHERE n.nurse_id = #{nurseId}
